scripts.deploy:staging: yarn build && near deploy --accountId contract-staging.swapstationio.testnet --wasmFile build/release/swapstation.wasm
scripts.deploy:testnet: yarn build && near deploy --accountId contract.swapstationio.testnet --wasmFile build/release/swapstation.wasm
scripts.deploy:mainnet: yarn build && near deploy --accountId contract.swapstationio --wasmFile build/release/swapstation.wasm
